summary: Most of the creatures of the wildlife of Skyrim are presented in this 3 books. Im still woking on creatures like Falmer, Giants, Dragons, Draugh and Deadra. I will like to make books with a more extensive information on this ones.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone. I bring to you this new mod, with some creatures of skyrim.

Most of the creatures of the wildlife of Skyrim are presented in this 3 books. Im still woking on creatures like Falmer, Giants, Dragons, Draugh and Deadra. I will like to make books with a more extensive information on this ones.

Each book has:

-gives +1 Conjuration. (I chose this one because is information about creatures)
-Every creature have a picture.
-Level,Health,Magicka,Stamina,Spell/Abilities.
-Loot
-General locations
-Small text about the creature

- Location of the book:
The books are in Whiterun, Farengar's study attached to the main hall of Dragonsreach, its in the table of the small room left when you enter the study.

I Hope you like this new mod, and feel free to live sugestions and comments, it will help me gather information for improvements and updates.

I tried not to take the immersion of the game, i tried to put the text of the books liked it was made by a traveller so if you see some part of the text that seems out of this context, let me know and i'll try to change it to look more ingame.

My other mod "Skyrim Races Book"

Hope you enjoy. Thanks
author: Universus1
